name: Sam Machin
bio: Sam Machin has nearly 20 years of experience in the communications industry and a strong track record of innovation. His role as a developer advocate  enables him to attend events where he loves to chat with developers about their projects, His personal projects mostly revolve around Amazon Alexa, Sam created the AlexaPi project allowing developers to build thier own Alexa powered devices and he is recognised by Amazon as an Alexa Champion.
